<wd l="6672" t="11875" r="10022" b="12062" underlined="none" subsuperscript="none" fontSize="850" fontFace="Arial" fontFamily="swiss" fontPitch="variable" spacing="2">http://lorrie.cranor.org/pubs/toolbars.html.</wd>
<run underlined="none" subsuperscript="none" fontSize="300" fontFace="Arial" fontFamily="swiss" fontPitch="variable" spacing="12">
<nl orig="true"/>
</run>
</ln>
</para>
</column>
</section>
